position: Marketing associate Chalhoub Group| Performance Marketing| CRM & retention marketing| Affiliate marketing

experience.title: Marketing Specialist
experience.description: As a marketing specialist I work on ad campaigns for organisations. This may be pay per click advertising, social media advertising or other forms of advertising. My job is to make the highest number of people possible access the products or services that your client offers online through highly targeted ad campaigns.-  Develop and oversee overall performance marketing strategy- Have meetings with clients to discuss the type of advertising that they need and any suggested content or requirements for the ads- Create and manage Google Ad and YouTube campaigns. (SEM)- Create and manage Facebook Ads, Snapchat Ads and Instagram Ads. (Social media advertising)- Regularly review and optimise all advertising campaigns for positive ROAS- Manage Google Analytics and Branch to track and measure all marketing campaigns
experience.description_html: As a marketing specialist I work on ad campaigns for organisations. This may be pay per click advertising, social media advertising or other forms of advertising. My job is to make the highest number of people possible access the products or services that your client offers online through highly targeted ad campaigns.- Develop and oversee overall performance marketing strategy- Have meetings with clients to discuss the type of advertising that they need and any suggested content or requirements for the ads- Create and manage Google Ad and YouTube campaigns. (SEM)- Create and manage Facebook Ads, Snapchat Ads and Instagram Ads. (Social media advertising)- Regularly review and optimise all advertising campaigns for positive ROAS- Manage Google Analytics and Branch to track and measure all marketing campaigns

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.description: Assist in the management of marketing operations under the supervision of a marketing manager.- Manage and update company database and customer relationship management systems (CRM).- Collect quantitative and qualitative data from marketing campaigns.- Perform market analysis and research on competition.- Support the marketing team in daily administrative tasks.

experience.title: Business Development Associate
experience.description: Helped company to boost growth and sales. Conduct market research, develop business strategies, build client relationships, and identify new business opportunities.
